Container.Name: Nginx-Proxy-Manager
Container.Overview:
Nginx Proxy Manager (NPM) allows adding proxy hosts through a password-protected multi-user WebUI. Add free Let's Encrypt SSL certificates to secure your web services. They are renewed by NPM automatically.
Default login: admin@example.com
Password: changeme
Container.Category: Tools:Utilities Other: Network:Web Network:Proxy Network:Management Network:Other
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please consider Donating.
Container.Requires: This template is intended to run Nginx Proxy Manager together with MariaDB. MariaDB must already be installed, you must have already created a database, a user and a password for NPM. It is not mandatory, but it is also recommended that you have created a custom bridge network and put the two containers in the same network, in this way they can communicate between them and the name of the container can be used instead of the IP address to connect to MariaDB.
